other_tests.findings: Patient demonstrated irritability, pressured speech, and inappropriate laughter. Talked grandiosely.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Acute psychotic symptoms diminished after treatment with haloperidol.

other_tests.findings: Unremarkable; patient appeared depressed and tearful with moderate psychomotor retardation.
Failed to identify a source for increased temperature and malaise.
Developed macular rash; drug reaction to captopril suspected.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Captopril was discontinued and skin rash resolved.
